title: Cover Crops and Reduced Tillage on a Vegetable Farm with Thomas Ruggieri

subtasks: Describing the farm's location and size
Discussing CSA participation and member involvement
Detailing soil improvement techniques and results
Describing cover crop methods and equipment used
Presenting data on soil organic matter and carbon sequestration
Sharing experiences with no-till planting and roller crimping
Outlining challenges faced during project implementation
Presenting results from tomato and brassica trials
Discussing equipment and costs associated with projects
Considering alternative weed control methods (e.g., bindweed mites)
Exploring future directions for farming practices

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Operating a farm, then subtasks can be building and maintaining barns, houses, high tunnels, etc.
